name: Squirrel (hmidoukourouk)
description:
you play a squirrel and you have to collect pine cones (10) before the time runs out.

Rangers will however be nearby to capture you if they see you (they only have nets so you are safe on top of the trees and underneath them).

if you manage to knock out a ranger by throwing snow on him, you gain 60 seconds.

At the end of the game, the score is published online and a leaderboard is displayed (to win you have to collect all 10 pine cones).
